Comments :
The death of a child in mysterious circumstances; sparks of a series 
of events that seem to represent biblical plague. Occurring in 
of all places a town called *Haven* located deep in the bowels of 
bible belt country in the bayous of Louisiana. A former Christian 
missionary turned religious phenomena debunker and her top open minded 
student turned personnel assistant is sent to investigate.

Director : Stephen Hopkins

Writers: Chad Hayes
